page.title: 14A CHURCH
page.content: St.Andrew's is a Church of England Parish Church.It lies to the east of Crowlands School between St.Andrews Road and Cotleigh Road,Romford,Essex.The church was built in 1862 by the Ind family,who owned the local brewery.The church stands in its own grounds and is made of stone.It has a spire,porch and stained glass windows.There is no graveyard but there is a Memorial Cross.The church is about 27 metres long.It seats about 4OO people.There is a disused galllery at the back of the church.There is a church hall nearby in Cotleigh Road where cubs,brownies etc. are held.Father Paul is the vicar at the moment.
